results.title: The Secret History of Gun Rights: How Lawmakers Armed the N.R.A.

results.title: Why Did 488 Golden Retrievers Gather in Scotland?
results.abstract: About every five years, owners and their dogs travel to Guisachan in the Highlands to celebrate the anniversary of the breed’s founding. This year’s edition was the biggest yet.
